alert.note: Alert for Central and Southern Scott County; Northern Montgomery County Higher Elevations; Yell Excluding Northwest (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 02 at 7:02PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Scott, southwestern Yell and northwestern Montgomery Counties through 730 PM CDT... At 702 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles southwest of Gravelly, or 16 miles east of Waldron, moving south at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Muddy Creek WMA... Harvey... Nola... Cedar Creek... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central and Southern Scott County; Northern Montgomery County Higher Elevations; Yell Excluding Northwest
